subject: Re: Displaying the results of parameterized JUnit 4 tests in Eclipse
msgSnippet: ... although ... func=detail&aid=1647993&group_id=15278&atid=365278 ... Hi, Yes, this would be a great feature to be able to override the description of a test
messageBody:
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "David Saff" <saff@...> wrote:
> 1) This is a frequently requested feature, and I support it,
although
> we've not gotten it into the source tree yet. Let me know if the
> proposal at
>
> http://sourceforge.net/tracker/index.php?
func=detail&aid=1647993&group_id=15278&atid=365278
>
> Would meet your needs.
>
Hi,

Yes, this would be a great feature to be able to override the
description of a test that should be used/displayed by all the
runners.
I would highly appreciate if this description could be set
programatically to any string not only for parameterized tests, but
for any kind of tests.

Best regards,
Tibor
